ygData.subject: RE: [archive-crawler] how to get external links only 1 hop and still get the whole domain within 20 hops
ygData.msgSnippet: alsoCheckVia will get you 1 L hop off, but if you want 2 then you ll need to make non-trivial changes to Heritrix. ... I assume that this links isn t found
